Tadej's Blog Code, Life and Coffee.

Hi and welcome

my name is Tadej. I'm a software developer from Slovenia, currently living in Dublin. This is where I write about things I find interesting: software, sports, books, life and other stuff I may think of. I try very hard to be witty and funny. It backfires most of the time.
